display_long_description:
Welcome to Fire Extinguisher VR (Demo), an immersive fire extinguisher training experience.

In this demo version of the application, users are limited to the "Freeplay" mode to try out the extinguishers freely. Purchase the full version here: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4761727627191250/

The full version contains the following:

Users are shown a training presentation that includes classes of fires, types of fire extinguishers and the correct usage. After an interactive quiz to assess their knowledge, users are immersed in a simulation where they need to put their expertise to the test and extinguish a fire under pressure.  

We’ve developed Fire Extinguisher VR to simulate the exact steps you would need to take in real life to use a fire extinguisher safely. Featuring sounds, timed responses and following the same process you’d need to take in real-life, Fire XR is more cost-effective and realistic than the majority of fire extinguisher training on offer.
